Package com.ibm.rest

Class BookingController

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.rest.BookingController
@CrossOrigin @RestController public class BookingController extends Object
REST controller for handling Booking-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • addBooking

      @PostMapping(path="/booking/book", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Booking> addBooking(@RequestBody Booking b)
      Endpoint for adding a new booking. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/booking/add
      Parameters:
      b - the booking object to be added
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the added booking and HTTP status

    • getAllBookings

      @GetMapping(path="/admin/booking/all", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Booking>> getAllBookings()
      Endpoint for retrieving all bookings. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/booking/all
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of all bookings and HTTP status

    • getBookingById

      @GetMapping(path="/booking/search/id/{id}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Booking> getBookingById(@PathVariable int id) throws BookingNotFoundException
      Endpoint for retrieving a booking by ID. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/booking/search/id/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the booking
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the booking object and HTTP status
      Throws:
      BookingNotFoundException - if the booking is not found

    • removeBookingById

      @DeleteMapping(path="/admin/booking/remove/id/{id}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> removeBookingById(@PathVariable int id) throws BookingNotFoundException
      Endpoint for removing a booking by ID. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/booking/remove/id/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the booking to be removed
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the response message and HTTP status
      Throws:
      BookingNotFoundException - if the booking is not found
